name: Pulse (itch) (Reddo)
description:
Pulse is a rhythm game played entirely with the left click of the mouse. With well timed presses you will be able to follow the pulse of the song until the end, but it won't be easy.

Music used:

  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=62uvW_lzNuc Sappheiros - Embrace
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=23pOUlo4R8U Geographer - Arp Bounce
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=42CB5_3mP6M Bensound - Summer
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eN2GyZawtMs Take You Home Tonight - Vibe Tracks

All music is Royalty Free.
